response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' needs and desires, which is why we are offering this exceptional item at a special price tailored specifically for you. Considering its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $1,300,000 for this product. This offer not only ensures you secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate but also aligns closely with the perceived value you place on it, estimated at $1,200,000. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially welcoming you as a valued member of our esteemed clientele.", "product_price": 1300000}
